caption: Technique
description: The Technique object describes the technique related to an attack, as defined by ATT&CK MatrixTM.
name: technique
description: The technique object describes the ATT&CK Matrix technique related to an attack.

name.description: The name of the attack technique, as defined by ATT&CK MatrixTM. For example: Drive-by Compromise.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the attack technique, as defined by ATT&CK MatrixTM. For example: T1189.
